title: Help Please I Don't Understand What Is Happening!
body: So Friday I bought some riot points putting in my new card I received in the mail (it holds my paycheck until direct deposit is set up from work) This is the third card I have linked to riot, this is due to first card being my bank card, second card being the temp card my work gave me, and the third is the new card I just received. Now I log into league and it says my account is perma banned and to check my email for info regarding it. I checked both my emails I ever linked to this account and I received no email regarding why I was banned. Also Ive only ever received a leaver buster one time for 5 minutes. Why would I be perma banned for spending money on this game?  Can I get my account back? I sent in a ticket, but I'm so upset. My boyfriend bought be DJ SONA and now I can't even play it. I really don't want to start over.....I spent so much money on the game between my account and my boyfriend's account (I buy him lots of skins because I love him and he loves this game). What can I even do.....Im really distraught.

replies.body: I looked over your account for you, and it looks like there were some suspicious logins that were signs of this account being compromised (hacked). Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and after verifying yourself as the original creator those agents should be able to get you back in.
Thank you. Ive done that and now should have access to my account again.
